item.title: It's On Fire! ðŸ”¥
item.description: The FLARE team is now enthusiastic about Google products and services but we suspect there is more to this Android game than meets the eye. The first thing is to decompile the apk to inspect the application files. Since this is a Flare-On challenge, attempt to search for flare-on.com shows up in the strings.xml : Where is this string used in the code? private final String d(Context context) { String slice; String string = context.
